title: Diff-in-Diffs
slogan: A free online course about the basics of Differences-in-Differences designs
description: The DiD short course is a gentle and gradual introduction to creating, applying, and evaluating differences-in-differences research designs using the R programming language. It is meant for students with familiarity with the basics of causal inference and R programming, but is appropriate for any person wanting to learn about research designs in R. .

footerLinks.text: Please report any bugs you find as an issue (click me to add an issue)
